meaning: to leave something or someone behind

example_sentences: ["The balloon will expand as you blow into it."]
["I expect you to be on time."]
["The diamond ring was very expensive."]
["The camping trip was a great experience."]

meaning: someone who knows a lot about something
example_sentences: ["She is an expert at playing chess."]

meaning: to make something clear and easy to understand
example_sentences: ["Please explain how to solve this problem."]

meaning: to travel around a new place to learn about it
example_sentences: ["We went to explore the forest."]

meaning: to show your feelings or ideas
example_sentences: ["He used art to express his feelings."]

meaning: to make something longer or larger
example_sentences: ["We need to extend the deadline."]
["The external walls need painting."]
["The acrobat performed an extraordinary trick."]
["The extreme cold made everyone shiver."]

meaning: treating everyone equally; or light in colour
example_sentences: ["The teacher was fair to all students."]
["The song sounded familiar to me."]
["The best feature of the house is the garden."]
["The fierce lion roared loudly."]
["Please focus on your work."]
["We were fortunate to find shelter before the rain."]
["Be careful with the fragile glass ornament."]

meaning: the purpose or role of something
example_sentences: ["The function of the heart is to pump blood."]

meaning: willing to give and share with others
example_sentences: ["My generous friend shared her lunch with me."]

meaning: soft and kind; not rough or harsh
example_sentences: ["The gentle breeze cooled us down on the hot day."]

meaning: dark and dull; or feeling sad
example_sentences: ["The gloomy weather made everyone feel tired."]
["I am grateful for your help with my homework."]
["Do not hesitate to ask if you need help."]

meaning: telling the truth and not cheating
example_sentences: ["An honest person always tells the truth."]

meaning: to form a picture in your mind
example_sentences: ["Close your eyes and imagine you are on a beach."]
["It is important to brush your teeth every day."]
["The magician performed an incredible trick."]
["My initial reaction was surprise."]

meaning: able to learn and understand things quickly
example_sentences: ["The intelligent student solved the puzzle quickly."]
["The internal parts of the machine are complex."]

meaning: to explain the meaning of something
example_sentences: ["Can you interpret this poem for me?"]
["Try not to feel jealous of your friend's new toy."]

meaning: travelling from one place to another
example_sentences: ["The journey to the seaside took two hours."]
["The children were joyful on Christmas morning."]
["The magnificent palace had golden gates."]
["This is a major discovery for science."]
["It was only a minor scratch on my knee."]
